'''
@File:client_permissions.py
@DateTime:2022/3/22 4:24 下午
@Author:xixiaoyu
@Desc:

from rest_framework.permissions import BasePermission

from client.models.role import Role, Platform
from client.models.user import S1User
from consts.menus import CLIENT_MENU
from consts.user import SCF_CLIENT_SERVICE



[文档]class ClientMenuBasePermission(BasePermission):
    """
    权限基类
    """
    menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[1]['children'][0]['name']


[文档]    def has_permission(self, request, view):
        user = request.user
        # 如果用户未激活，禁止访问
        if not user.is_active:
            return False

        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_CLIENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # 普通用户检验访问权限
        menu_code_name = self.menu_code_name

        # 获取当前用户在s1库中的用户实例
        s1_user_instance = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            pk=user.id,
        ).first()

        result = Role.objects.filter(
            is_deleted=False,
            platform_id=platform_id,
            userrole__s1_user_id=s1_user_instance.id,
            roleappmenus__app_menus__code=menu_code_name,
        ).exists()

        return result

[文档]class XLetterManageReceivedOpenApprovePermission(ClientMenuBasePermission):
    """
    X信 - X信管理 - 开立审批 | X信接收审批
    """
    received_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][3]["name"]
    open_approve_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][2]["name"]


[文档]    def has_permission(self, request, view):
        user = request.user
        # 如果用户未激活，禁止访问
        if not user.is_active:
            return False

        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_CLIENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # 普通用户检验访问权限
        menu_code_name = [self.received_menu_code_name, self.open_approve_menu_code_name]
        # 获取当前用户在s1库中的用户实例
        s1_user_instance = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            pk=user.id,
        ).first()

        result = Role.objects.filter(
            is_deleted=False,
            platform_id=platform_id,
            userrole__s1_user_id=s1_user_instance.id,
            roleappmenus__app_menus__code__in=menu_code_name,
        ).exists()

        return result

    transfer_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][4]["name"]


[文档]    def has_permission(self, request, view):
        user = request.user
        # 如果用户未激活，禁止访问
        if not user.is_active:
            return False

        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_CLIENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # 普通用户检验访问权限
        menu_code_name = [self.received_menu_code_name, self.transfer_menu_code_name]
        # 获取当前用户在s1库中的用户实例
        s1_user_instance = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            pk=user.id,
        ).first()

        result = Role.objects.filter(
            is_deleted=False,
            platform_id=platform_id,
            userrole__s1_user_id=s1_user_instance.id,
            roleappmenus__app_menus__code__in=menu_code_name,
        ).exists()

        return result




[文档]class XLetterManageOpenApproveReceivedTransferApprovePermission(ClientMenuBasePermission):
    """
    X信 - X信管理 - 开立 转让 融资开立审批
    """
    open_approve_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][2]["name"]
    received_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][3]["name"]
    transfer_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][4]["name"]
    approve_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][2]['children'][0]["name"]


[文档]    def has_permission(self, request, view):
        user = request.user
        # 如果用户未激活，禁止访问
        if not user.is_active:
            return False

        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_CLIENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # 普通用户检验访问权限
        menu_code_name = [
            self.open_approve_menu_code_name,
            self.received_menu_code_name,
            self.transfer_menu_code_name,
            self.approve_menu_code_name
        ]
        # 获取当前用户在s1库中的用户实例
        s1_user_instance = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            pk=user.id,
        ).first()

        result = Role.objects.filter(
            is_deleted=False,
            platform_id=platform_id,
            userrole__s1_user_id=s1_user_instance.id,
            roleappmenus__app_menus__code__in=menu_code_name,
        ).exists()

        return result

    """
    X信 - X信管理 - 开立 转让 融资开立审批
    """
    open_approve_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][2]["name"]
    received_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][3]["name"]
    transfer_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][1]['children'][4]["name"]
    financing_menu_code_name = CLIENT_MENU[0]['children'][2]['children'][0]["name"]


[文档]    def has_permission(self, request, view):
        user = request.user
        # 如果用户未激活，禁止访问
        if not user.is_active:
            return False

        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_CLIENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # 普通用户检验访问权限
        menu_code_name = [
            self.open_approve_menu_code_name,
            self.received_menu_code_name,
            self.transfer_menu_code_name,
            self.financing_menu_code_name
        ]
        # 获取当前用户在s1库中的用户实例
        s1_user_instance = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            pk=user.id,
        ).first()

        result = Role.objects.filter(
            is_deleted=False,
            platform_id=platform_id,
            userrole__s1_user_id=s1_user_instance.id,
            roleappmenus__app_menus__code__in=menu_code_name,
        ).exists()

        return result
